# HKDocumentTypeIdentifier

**Structure**

The identifiers for documents.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HKDocumentTypeIdentifier
```

## Overview

To create an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentType] instance, pass an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentTypeIdentifier] value to the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKObjectType/documentType(forIdentifier:)] method.

For the complete list of quantity type identifiers, see Document Types.

## Document Types

- **CDA**: The CDA Document type identifier, used when requesting permission to read or share CDA documents.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Returns a newly initialized document type identifier using the provided string.

## Creating document types

- **documentType(forIdentifier:)**: Returns the shared document type for the provided identifier.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
